definition: Nanling mountain, on the border of Hunan, Jiangxi, Guangdong and Guangxi

sentences.english: Southeast Hunan lies on the margin of central Naning Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 湘東南地區位於南嶺中段北緣。

sentences.english: The Xitian tin orefield constitutes an important of the Nanling multi-metallic mineralized belt.
sentences.chinese: 錫田礦田屬南嶺成礦帶的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The Nanling of South China is one of the most important areas of nonferrous metal mineral resources.
sentences.chinese: 南嶺地區是中國有色金屬礦產資源重要基地之一。

definition: postal kiosk/(old) rest shelter for couriers
to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
Baqiao District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
Jintai District of Baoji City 寶雞市|宝鸡市[Bao3 ji1 Shi4], Shaanxi
Pengze county in Jiujiang 九江, Jiangxi
fire beacon (used as alarm signal over long distance)
Lord of the East, the sun God of Chinese mythology
